message.content:
{"id": "24779", 
 "title": "Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed", 
 "description": "Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed It has already been attempted to remove the reference to invalid views, but was unsuccessful.", 
 "OB": "1. Open Eclipse. 2. Open a view that belongs to a plugin that can be easily added and removed (e.g., the EditorList plugin).", 
 "EB": "1. Open Eclipse. 2. Open a view that belongs to a plugin that can be easily added and removed (e.g., the EditorList plugin). 3. Open an additional perspective (e.g., the 'Java' perspective).", 
 "SR": "When there are two opened perspectives, close Eclipse. Then, remove or move the plugin that contains the view that no longer exists. Finally, switch to the perspective that contains the invalid view. The 'Unable to restore perspective' error message will be displayed. Close and restart Eclipse to see that the error messages no longer appear."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '24779', 'title': 'Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed', 'description': "Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed It already tried, and it can't.8. ", 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'Open eclipse, open a view which belong to a plugin you can easily add andremove (I used the EditorList plugin).2. Open an other perspective (the \'Java\' perspective for example).You have now two opened perspective. Close eclipse.4. Remove/Move the plugin5. Switch to the perspective which contains the view which no longer exists.Same "Unable to restore perspective ..." error message. Close and restart eclipse.No more error messages. '}
